# Cultural Heritage Data Guides - R {-}

Welcome to these guides for working with the Royal Danish Library's digital cultural heritage.

This site contains guides in the form of R scripts that you can use to programmatically explore datasets that are made from the Royal Danish Library's digital collections. [If you are more familiar with Python you can find Python scripts on another page.](https://kb-dk.github.io/cultural-heritage-data-guides-Python/)

## Download scripts to your computer
You can download the scripts as .ipynb files or .pdf files. Find the download icon in the to menu and click on either “.ipynb” or “.pdf”
